/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, enhancing the colors and details of the scene.
